scripts.pkg: mkdir -p ./output/obsidian-mynb/ && mv main.js ./output/obsidian-mynb/ && cp manifest.json styles.css README.md ./output/obsidian-mynb/
scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && pnpm run pkg
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
